item.title: Dog Chew Toys for Puppy Teething – 20 Pack Indestructible Pet Dog Toys for Puppy Chewers, Interactive Tug of War Rope Toys for Puppies, Small Dogs Durable Squeaky Toys for Boredom Chew Teething
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun! Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture! KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ qinhe
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09HJR2GBB

【Small Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection】: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ​Our toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
【Interactive Training Small Dog Toys】: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
【Safe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys】: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
【Quality Gifts And Service】: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!


KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !




4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

  • Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

  • Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

  • Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Read more


Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!


Read more

4.5

Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)


The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes “The Force” wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting “UNO!” This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
It’s the classic UNO card game everyone loves, now pitting the forces of the Light Side and the Dark Side against each other! Perfect for Younglings and Master Jedi alike, ages 7 years and older.
Each card is decorated with an iconic image from the Star Wars franchise, including classic characters from the original trilogy, the prequels and the sequels -a great collector’s edition!
Just like in the classic UNO game, players match cards by color or number in a race to empty their hand.
Includes an exclusive wild “The Force” card. Play it, choosing another player and a color. If that player has at least one card of that color, they are forced to draw 2 cards. If they don’t, play just continues with the chosen color.
UNO Star Wars makes a great gift for Star Wars fans of all ages.

5
Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Price: $1,399.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:23:43 UTC – Details)


CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.
System: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G 3.9GHz 6-Core | AMD B550 Chipset | 16GB DDR4 | 500GB NVMe SSD | 2TB HDD
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 8GB Video Card | 1x HDMI | 2x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 6 x USB 3.1 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | 802.11AC Wi-Fi | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Keyboard and mouse
Special feature: Tempered glass side case panel | Custom RGB case lighting | RGB 7 colors gaming mouse
1 year parts & labor | Free lifetime tech support





About CyberPowerPC:

CyberPowerPC gaming systems are the choice of top gamers everywhere, from pro esports players to pro streamers. However, although it’s used by the best, it’s built for any and every gamer out there. We challenge you to Get On Our Level. Let us give you the tools to take you to top. Every game you dominate, every level you smash, every competition you win, we want to be a part of that every step of the way.

  • Intel Marketing Partner of the Year 2020.
  • Microsoft US Partner of the Year 2020.

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master – AMD Series

Enthusiast Level Gaming Computer System

CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD’s newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU is the core to the series with fast processing speeds and up to 6 cores / 12 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the latest AMD Radeon or NVIDIA’s GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.

  • VR Ready with HTC VIVE and Oculus Rift.
  • Optimized for gaming at Ultra High game settings and high resolutions.
  • AMD Ryzen Processor
  • Performance NVIDIA Graphics Processor
  • Wireless 802.11 AC Wi-Fi
  • Gaming Keyboard and RGB 7 Color Mouse Combo

Price: $54.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:20:43 UTC – Details)


The Tile Starter Pack is an easy way to keep track of all the things you can’t live without. Mate is a versatile tracker that easily attaches to everyday must-haves likes keys, backpacks, wallets, and more. It has up to 250 ft Bluetooth range and a 3-year non-replaceable battery. Slim, Tile’s thinnest tracker, easily slides into your wallet, luggage tag, or a book. It has a 200 ft Bluetooth range and 3-year non-replaceable battery. Both Mate and Slim are water-resistant, work with Android and Apple® devices, have voice-assisted finding with Alexa, Google and Siri, and can be used to ring your phone if it ever gets lost.
TRACKER FOR KEYS, WALLETS AND MORE: Get started with our Mate and Slim to help you easily find what you can’t live without like your keys and wallet. Keep track of more for less with our multi-packs or give them to your friends and family as a gift.
FIND NEARBY — Use the Tile app to ring your Tile when it’s within Bluetooth range, or ask your Smart Home device to find it for you.
FIND FAR AWAY — When outside of Bluetooth range, use the Tile app to view your Tile’s most recent location on a map.
FIND YOUR PHONE- Double press the button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it’s on silent.
NOTIFY WHEN FOUND — Enlist the secure and anonymous help of the Tile Network to help find your things. If your lost Tile is found, If your Tile is lost, add your contact information so you can be reached when someone scans the QR code on your lost Tile.
ANDROID, IOS & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE – Find your things with the free Tile app on both iOS and Android devices. Tile also works with Amazon Alexa, Hey Google and Siri
TECH SPECS: Water-Resistant (IP67 rated), Up to 3-year non-replaceable battery, Up to 250 ft / 76 m Bluetooth range
UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM PLAN: Get proactive Smart Alert notifications when you leave something behind, and with Item Reimbursement, if we can’t find your Tiled item, we reimburse you.



Previous page

Next page

Price: $29.95 - $25.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:19:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The only tool in the marketplace able to diagnose & repair LED lights!

The LED Keeper fixes LED holiday light sets. It is every decorator’s must-have and saves you not only time, but money. No need to toss your pre-lit décor when you have lights out. Use the LED Keeper to keep your holidays bright!

How it Works

The LED Keeper uses insulation piercing to connect to the copper within the light set wires and illuminate functioning sections by creating mini-circuits. Success is achieved through the process of elimination.

Complete Tool for the Repair of LED Light Sets

The LED Keeper pays for itself and is provides everything you’d need to fix a light set:

Built-in Bulb & Fuse Tester
Includes 2 Universal Replacement PODs
2 Place Markers to assist in testing are also included
Comes complete with a 9V battery
Has a Bulb Puller

Fixes sets with replaceable or non-replaceable bulbs

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.

Every decorator’s must-have!

This Cool Yule Tool saves you time and money. No more throwing your light sets and pre-lit décor away. Now you can save them with the squeeze of a trigger. There are also numerous resources available to assist you as you become a light set repair Pro yourself! We have instructional videos and even have a toll-free number available with U.S.-based techs to assist in all of your light set repair questions.

Fixes LED Light Sets (Does NOT work on Incandescent light sets)
2 Universal PODs included to assist with socket issues or if you simply don’t have the correct replacement bulb your set requires
2 Place Markers included to assist with testing
One 9 Volt battery included
Pays for itself
Intended for conventional Christmas LED light sets that are manufactured in series design.
Cannot assist with incandescent, rope lights, light sets with control boxes, low voltage or battery-operated light sets.


The only tool in the marketplace able to diagnose & repair LED lights!

The LED Keeper fixes LED holiday light sets. It is every decorator’s must-have and saves you not only time, but money. No need to toss your pre-lit décor when you have lights out. Use the LED Keeper to keep your holidays bright!

Read more


How it Works

The LED Keeper uses insulation piercing to connect to the copper within the light set wires and illuminate functioning sections by creating mini-circuits. Success is achieved through the process of elimination.


Complete Tool for the Repair of LED Light Sets

The LED Keeper pays for itself and is provides everything you’d need to fix a light set:

  • Built-in Bulb & Fuse Tester
  • Includes 2 Universal Replacement PODs
  • 2 Place Markers to assist in testing are also included

Use a POD if your set is experiencing a socket issue that cannot be solved, if the precise replacement bulb for the set cannot be located, or if the set has non-replaceable (sealed construction) LEDs. The PODs were designed to repair LEDs only. If you were to use a POD on an incandescent set, the set would not illuminate and remain dysfunctional. The PODs were not designed to illuminate but are necessary for the repair of the LED set in order to maintain the electrical balance. If a POD is not used and a dead bulb/socket remains, then more voltage is being forced upon the remaining functional bulbs.

loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Carhartt Seat Saver seat covers from Cover craft are the solution to the problem of keeping the seats in your truck or SUV clean and protected from daily use and weekend adventures. Made from durable, duck-weave fabric, these custom-fit seat covers protect your seats from dirt, mud, grime, spills and more. Featuring Rain Defender technology, a durable water repellency finish is added to the fabric to make it highly water resistant. Combine these features with the custom fitment and classic Carhartt styling, you get seat covers that look great and protect your seats from whatever you throw at them.
First row bucket seats for select RAM models, gravel. Classic Duck-Weave Carhartt fabric for durability
Custom-made for your specific year, make and model seats
Easy installation and removal
Machine washable. Headrest covers included, center console cover not included
Seat configuration: Front row bucket seats with adjustable headrests with seat airbags



Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers

Don't let the good looks fool you. These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit. Our Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are designed for heavy-duty protection for work, hunting, fishing, pets, and anything else you throw at them. Not only is the fabric super durable, but it is highly water-resistant to bead away any moisture, spills, or drool from your pups.

Read more

Variety of Seat Seat Styles and Configurations




Custom Patterned Seat Cover

Our Carhartt Seat Covers are custom-patterned for a perfect fit. Enter your Year/Make/Model details and you should see all patterns available for your vehicle.

Make Your Seats Carhartt Tough

Our Carhartt SeatSaver Seat Covers are designed to fit great while being easy on/off seat covers with the same amazing rugged durability you expect from Carhartt.

All Applicable Headrests & Armrests Included

Our Carhartt Seat Covers not only cover the entire backside of the seat on front seat covers we also have rear map pockets built-in so that you don't lose any much-needed storage space.

Read more


Authentic Carhartt Products

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers are the trusted, durable, and dependable design you know and love from Carhartt.


Pillow to Secure Cover

Each seat cover includes a pillow tab to secure the cover. No slipping, sliding or refitting this seat cover thanks to the securing pillow.


Carhartt Styling

Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are the ideal seat cover when your primary focus is a great fit and superior protection paired with a classic nod to the Carhartt clothing you have come to love.


Carhartt Triple Stitched Seams

These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit.

Sports Watch: Shock Resistant, perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing, etcShock Resistant, perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing, etc
